item.text: After this the following episode took place. Naboth the Jezreelite owned a vineyard in Jezreel adjacent to the palace of King Ahab of Samaria.

<st data-num="0256" class="">Ahab</st> <st data-num="01696 0559">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="05022" class="">Naboth</st>, “<st data-num="05414" class="">Give</st> me your <st data-num="03754" class="">vineyard</st> so I can <st data-num="01961" class="">make</st> a <st data-num="03419" class="">vegetable</st> <st data-num="01588" class="">garden</st> out of it, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> is <st data-num="07138" class="">adjacent</st> <st data-num="0681" class="">to</st> my <st data-num="01004" class="">palace</st>. I will <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> you an <st data-num="02896 04480">even better</st> <st data-num="03754" class="">vineyard</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">in</st> its <st data-num="08478" class="">place</st>, or <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> <st data-num="05869" class="">you</st> <st data-num="02896" class="">prefer</st>,<n id="1" /> I will <st data-num="05414" class="">pay</st> you <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="04242" class="">for</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">it</st>.”<n id="2" />
But Naboth replied to Ahab, “The Lord forbid that I should sell you my ancestral inheritance.”
So Ahab went into his palace, bitter and angry that Naboth the Jezreelite had said, “I will not sell to you my ancestral inheritance.” He lay down on his bed, pouted, and would not eat.

Then his <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st> <st data-num="0348" class="">Jezebel</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">in</st> and <st data-num="01696" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, “<st data-num="04100 02088">Why</st> do you have a <st data-num="05620" class="">bitter</st> <st data-num="07307" class="">attitude</st> and <st data-num="0369" class="">refuse</st> to <st data-num="0398 03899">eat</st>?”

He <st data-num="01696 0413">answered</st> her, “<st data-num="03588" class="">While</st> I was <st data-num="01696" class="">talking</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="05022" class="">Naboth</st> the <st data-num="03158" class="">Jezreelite</st>, I <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to him, ‘<st data-num="05414" class="">Sell</st> me your <st data-num="03754" class="">vineyard</st> for <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st>, <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="02655" class="">prefer</st>, I will <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> you another <st data-num="03754" class="">vineyard</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">in</st> its <st data-num="08478" class="">place</st>.’ But he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, ‘I will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">sell</st> you my <st data-num="03754" class="">vineyard</st>.’”<n id="1" />
His wife Jezebel said to him, “You are the king of Israel! Get up, eat some food, and have a good time. I will get the vineyard of Naboth the Jezreelite for you.”
She wrote out orders, signed Ahab’s name to them, and sealed them with his seal. She then sent the orders to the leaders and to the nobles who lived in Naboth’s city.

<st data-num="0559" class="">This</st> is <st data-num="05612" class="">what</st> she <st data-num="03789" class="">wrote</st>:<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="07121" class="">Observe</st> a <st data-num="06685" class="">time of fasting</st> and <st data-num="03427" class="">seat</st> <st data-num="05022" class="">Naboth</st> in <st data-num="07218" class="">front</st> of the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>.
Also seat two villains opposite him and have them testify, ‘You cursed God and the king.’ Then take him out and stone him to death.”
The men of the city, the leaders, and the nobles who lived there followed the written orders Jezebel had sent them.

They <st data-num="07121" class="">observed</st> a <st data-num="06685" class="">time of fasting</st> and <st data-num="03427" class="">put</st> <st data-num="05022" class="">Naboth</st> in <st data-num="07218" class="">front</st> of the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>.

The <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="0376 01121 01100">villains</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">arrived</st> and <st data-num="03427" class="">sat</st> <st data-num="05048" class="">opposite</st> him. Then the <st data-num="0376 01100">villains</st> <st data-num="05749" class="">testified against</st> <st data-num="05022" class="">Naboth</st> <st data-num="05048" class="">right before</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>, <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="05022" class="">Naboth</st> <st data-num="01288" class="">cursed</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> and the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>.” So they <st data-num="03318" class="">dragged</st> him<n id="1" /> <st data-num="02351" class="">outside</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> and <st data-num="05619 068">stoned</st> him to <st data-num="04191" class="">death</st>.<n id="2" />
Then they reported to Jezebel, “Naboth has been stoned to death.”

When Jezebel heard that Naboth had been stoned to death, she said to Ahab, “Get up, take possession of the vineyard Naboth the Jezreelite refused to sell you for silver, for Naboth is no longer alive; he’s dead.”
When Ahab heard that Naboth was dead, he got up and went down to take possession of the vineyard of Naboth the Jezreelite.
The Lord’s message came to Elijah the Tishbite:

“<st data-num="06965" class="">Get up</st>, <st data-num="03381" class="">go down</st> and <st data-num="07125" class="">meet</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="0256" class="">Ahab</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> lives in <st data-num="08111" class="">Samaria</st>. <st data-num="02009" class="">He</st> is at the <st data-num="03754" class="">vineyard</st> of <st data-num="05022" class="">Naboth</st>; he has <st data-num="0834 03381">gone down</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> to <st data-num="03423" class="">take possession</st> of it.

Say to him, ‘This is what the Lord has said: “Haven’t you committed murder and taken possession of the property of the deceased?”’ Then say to him, ‘This is what the Lord has said: “In the spot where dogs licked up Naboth’s blood they will also lick up your blood—yes, yours!”’”
When Elijah arrived, Ahab said to him, “So, you have found me, my enemy!” Elijah replied, “I have found you, because you are committed to doing evil in the sight of the Lord.
The Lord says, ‘Look, I am ready to bring disaster on you. I will destroy you and cut off every last male belonging to Ahab in Israel, including even the weak and incapacitated.

I will <st data-num="05414" class="">make</st> your <st data-num="01004" class="">dynasty</st><n id="1" /> like <st data-num="01004" class="">those</st> of <st data-num="03379" class="">Jeroboam</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05028" class="">Nebat</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">and</st> <st data-num="01201" class="">Baasha</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0281" class="">Ahijah</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">because</st> you <st data-num="03708 0834 03707">angered</st> me and <st data-num="02398" class="">made</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="02398" class="">sin</st>.’<n id="2" />
The Lord says this about Jezebel, ‘Dogs will devour Jezebel by the outer wall of Jezreel.’

As for <st data-num="0256" class="">Ahab’s</st> family, <st data-num="03611" class="">dogs</st> will <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> the ones<n id="1" /> who <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> in the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>, and the <st data-num="05775" class="">birds</st> of the <st data-num="08064" class="">sky</st> will <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> the ones who <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> in the <st data-num="07704" class="">country</st>.”
(There had never been anyone like Ahab, who was firmly committed to doing evil in the sight of the Lord, urged on by his wife Jezebel.
He was so wicked he worshiped the disgusting idols, just as the Amorites whom the Lord had driven out from before the Israelites.)
When Ahab heard these words, he tore his clothes, put on sackcloth, and fasted. He slept in sackcloth and walked around dejected.
The Lord’s message came to Elijah the Tishbite,
“Have you noticed how Ahab shows remorse before me? Because he shows remorse before me, I will not bring disaster on his dynasty during his lifetime, but during the reign of his son.”
